logoutModal.title: Some of Your Data Is Still Missing
logoutModal.itemsLeft: There {basicInfoQuestionsLeft, plural, =1 {is still one item} other {are still # items}} of basic info and {opinionQuestionsLeft, plural, =1 {one opinion} other {# opinions}} to fill. Your data won't be shown in the Election Compass until you have filled these, but you can login later to continue.
logoutModal.questionsLeft: There {opinionQuestionsLeft, plural, =1 {is still one opinion} other {are still # opinions}} to fill. Your data won't be shown in the Election Compass until you have filled these, but you can login later to continue.
logoutModal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout? You will be automatically logged out after {timeLeft} seconds.

basicInfo.instructions: Fill in first your basic details and upload a photo. You'll be asked for your political opinions thereafter.
basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.disclaimer: Your name and some other details are prefilled and cannot be changed. If there are any errors in them, please contact your party. If your Election Number is not visible, it will be automatically set after the candidate registration period ends on Oct 29.
basicInfo.errorMessage: An error occurred when sending data!
basicInfo.unaffiliatedDescription: Set this on if you're not a member of the party on whose list you are.
basicInfo.nominationsDescription: These are the constituencies where you're nominated along with the election list and possible election symbol. If a nomination is marked 'Pending', your election symbol might not yet be defined.

settings.title: Settings
settings.instructions: These settings only affect the way you use this app. Any information you enter here will not be shown to the public.
settings.emailDescription: We use this email to connect to you and for password reset. It will not be shown on your public profile.
settings.languageDescription: Use this application in this language. It will not be shown on your public profile.
settings.changeLanguageError: An error occurred while changing the application language.
settings.currentPasswordDescription: Enter your existing account password that you want to change.
settings.passwordIsTheSame: The new password is the same as the current password
settings.changePasswordError: Password change failed. Make sure that your current password is correct.

setPassword.description: Set a secure password according to the requirements below:
setPassword.passwordSetSuccesfully: Your password is now set! Please log in using it.

passwordValidation.username: Avoid using your name in the password

registration.enterCode: Enter the registration code that you've received from your party to register your account.
registration.title: Registration
registration.loggedInWarning: A user is currently logged in. Log out before proceeding.

resetPassword.title: Forgot Password?
resetPassword.description: To reset your password, please enter your email address below:
resetPassword.emailSentText: A reset password link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox and click the link to set your new password.
resetPassword.errorText: Internal error. Try again later or contact the administrator.

questions.title: Your opinions
questions.instructions: Next, the app will ask your opinions on {numQuestions} statements about political issues and values. When voters use the Election Compass, they will also answer the same statements and see how well their opinions agree with the yours.
questions.tip: You can see all your anwers on this page when you come back to it later.
questions.warning: You still have {numUnansweredQuestions} unanswered questions. Your data won't be shown in the Election Compass until you have answered all of them.
questions.info: You can see all of your opinions below and edit them by tapping on them.
questions.editingAllowedNote: Editing of your answers is no longer possible, but you can still view them. Please contact the administrator if there are some errors in the data.

homePage.explanation: In order to appear in the Election Compass, you have to enter some basic information about yourself as well as answer opinion statements concerning political issues.
homePage.editingNotAllowedNote: Editing of your answers is no longer possible, but you can still view them. Please contact the administrator if there are some errors in the data.
homePage.editingNotAllowedPartiallyFilled: Because you didn’t answer all of the questions, your profile won’t be shown.
homePage.title: You're Ready to Roll!
homePage.description: You have filled all of the information needed for the Election Compass. You can still edit your answers and even log in later to do that.
homePage.tip: If you want to see how the voters will see your profile, you can preview it.

preview.title: Preview
preview.tip: This is a preview of how your profile will look to voters.

help.title: Help
help.description: Here you can find answers to the most common questions with using this application.

textarea.info: You can supply your own translations for the languages the application is available in. If you don’t write your own translations, your original response will be shown.

error.userNoCandidateError: Error: The logged in user has no candidate info tied to it.

other.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
